summary: In efforts to construct perfect android killing machines in a war against China, UK scientists exceed their goal and create a sentient robot.
cast: Toby Stephens|Caity Lotz|Denis Lawson|Sam Hazeldine|Pooneh Hajimohammadi|John-Paul Macleod|Helen Griffin|Siwan Morris|Nicola Reynolds|Jade Croot|Jonathan Byrne|Alan Low|Sule Rimi|Joshua Higgott|Giles Thomas|Cornelius Garrett|Sam Ellis|Richard Shackley|Daniel Llewelyn-Williams|Dafydd Emyr|Ben McGregor|Clark Fisher|Gareth Jones|Paul James|Simon Winkler|Lee Paul Atkinson|Lee Nicholas Harris|Stuart Matthews|John Stylianou
director: Director: Caradog W. James (as Caradog James)
title: The Machine
